snippet.title: Sea of Roses
snippet.description:
Marion recognizes her house ... but nothing else. 

Where are her healing potions? And where is Anders?

- - - - -
Help Marion as she explores a new world -- and reconsiders the past.



'Sea of Roses'
Portugal



Award Winning Video Game
2020 Life.Love. Game Design Challenge
Developed by Ariana Parrilha, Andreia Santos Batista, & André Fidalgo Silva
Crescent Tea Studios

Produced by Jennifer Ann's Group



►Visit: SeaOfRosesGame.com◄


Coming June 29, 2021 on Steam for Windows / Mac / Linux
